meanings.sent1: The toy car is a nonlivings object.

meanings.definition: Things that do not possess life or consciousness.
meanings.sent1: In the museum, you can find various nonlivings displayed.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study nonlivings to understand the world around us.
meanings.sent3: The nonlivings in the room seemed to be having a secret meeting when no one was looking.
